H0.text: Graca Machel, the widow of a President of Mozambique, is the wife of which famous man. Nelson Mandela

H1.text: Graca Machel, the widow of a President of Mozambique, is the wife of which famous man. Samora Machel

H2.text: Graca Machel, the widow of a President of Mozambique, is the wife of which famous man. Thabo Mbeki

H3.text: Graca Machel, the widow of a President of Mozambique, is the wife of which famous man. 4664

A4.text: Graça Machel married Nelson Mandela in 1998.

A5.text: She and Machel were married at Tunduru in southern Tanzania in May 1969.

A6.text: Simbine married Samora Machel, the first president of Mozambique, in 1975.

A7.text: She is the widow of former President of Mozambique Samora Machel (1975–1986).
